item.title: Setup SSH in Github
item.description: Create SSH key Link to heading ssh-keygen -o -t rsa -C "any comment‚Äù The -o flag forces the tool to generate SSH keys with the OpenSSH format. The -t flag specifies the type of SSH keys to create. The -C flag allows for comments that get added as metadata at the end of the public key. Key generated to ~/.ssh folder View SSH key Link to heading cat ~/.
